title: Analytics Dashboard
subtitle: Full Stack Development
description: Real-time analytics platform with Spring Boot backend and React frontend
fullDescription: A comprehensive real-time analytics dashboard built for enterprise clients to monitor and visualize business metrics. The platform handles thousands of data points per second and provides interactive charts, customizable dashboards, and automated reporting features.
features: Real-time data visualization with WebSocket connections
Customizable dashboard layouts with drag-and-drop widgets
Advanced filtering and date range selection
Automated PDF report generation and email scheduling
Role-based access control and team collaboration
challenges: Optimizing database queries for large datasets (10M+ records)
Implementing efficient caching strategies with Redis
Building a scalable WebSocket infrastructure for real-time updates
outcome: Reduced report generation time by 80% and improved data accuracy to 99.9%. The platform now serves 500+ enterprise users with 99.95% uptime.

title: E-Commerce Platform
subtitle: System Design
description: Scalable e-commerce solution handling 10K+ concurrent users
fullDescription: A modern e-commerce platform designed to handle high traffic loads during flash sales and seasonal peaks. Built with microservices architecture to ensure scalability and reliability.
features: Product catalog with advanced search and filtering
Secure payment processing with Stripe integration
challenges: Handling 10K+ concurrent users during flash sales
Implementing a reliable shopping cart with session persistence
Building a recommendation engine for personalized suggestions
outcome: Successfully handled Black Friday traffic with zero downtime. Increased conversion rate by 35% through improved UX and faster page loads.

title: REST API Gateway
subtitle: Backend Architecture
description: High-performance API gateway with rate limiting and caching
fullDescription: A centralized API gateway that handles authentication, rate limiting, request routing, and monitoring for a microservices ecosystem. Designed for high throughput and low latency.
features: Rate limiting with configurable tiers per client
Circuit breaker pattern for fault tolerance
challenges: Achieving sub-10ms latency for request routing
Implementing distributed rate limiting across multiple instances
Building a robust health check and failover system
outcome: Reduced API response times by 40% and achieved 99.99% availability. Currently handling 1M+ requests per day across 50+ microservices.

title: Mobile Banking App
subtitle: FinTech Solution
description: Secure mobile banking application with real-time transactions
fullDescription: A mobile banking application providing secure and seamless banking experience. Built with focus on security, performance, and user experience.
features: Real-time balance updates and transaction history
challenges: Ensuring real-time sync across multiple devices
Building offline mode for limited connectivity scenarios
outcome: Achieved 4.8-star rating on app stores. Processing $50M+ in transactions monthly with zero security incidents.
